titles.title: A resolution extending the authority for the Senate National Security Working Group.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/20/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Amends specified Senate Resolutions to extend the authority for the Senate National Security Working Group from December 31, 2008, until December 31, 2010.
